recipe.name: Italian Dressing Chicken Marinade
recipe.description: Italian Dressing Chicken Marinade is an Italian Chicken Marinade that doubles as a salad dressing! This is one of my tricks for easy midweek meals and it's a highly effective method to make delicious meals with less effort. I've made a zucchini side salad here, but feel free to use the dressing for ANY salad you want!
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 tsp mixed Italian dried herbs ((either a packet mix or mix herbs like basil, parsley, oregano, rosemary and thyme))
750 g / 1.5lb  chicken thighs, boneless skinless, or breast ((cut in half horizontally))
2  zucchinis (, finely sliced into rounds using a mandolin)
2 tbsp baby mint leaves (, or 1 tbsp sliced larger mint leaves)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the Dressing Marinade ingredients in a small jar and shake well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the Dressing Marinade ingredients in a small jar and shake well to combine.

itemListElement.text: Put the Marinated Chicken ingredients in a bowl or ziplock bag and add 5 tablespoons of the Dressing Marinade.
itemListElement.name: Put the Marinated Chicken ingredients in a bowl or ziplock bag and add 5 tablespoons of the Dressing Marinade.

itemListElement.text: Massage / mix to coat the chicken. Set aside for marinade for at least 20 minutes, ideally 3 hours or up to 24 hours.
itemListElement.name: Massage / mix to coat the chicken. Set aside for marinade for at least 20 minutes, ideally 3 hours or up to 24 hours.

itemListElement.text: Grill/BBQ: You shouldn't need any oil, but if you are concerned, brush your grill with oil. Heat the grill on medium high and cook the chicken for around 3 to 4 minutes on each side. (Cook breast for less)
itemListElement.name: Grill/BBQ: You shouldn't need any oil, but if you are concerned, brush your grill with oil. Heat the grill on medium high and cook the chicken for around 3 to 4 minutes on each side. (Cook breast for less)

itemListElement.text: Stove: Preheat 1/2 tbsp oil in a large non stick fry pan over medium high heat. Add the chicken and cook each side for around 4 to 5 minutes, or until dark golden brown and cooked through.
itemListElement.name: Stove: Preheat 1/2 tbsp oil in a large non stick fry pan over medium high heat. Add the chicken and cook each side for around 4 to 5 minutes, or until dark golden brown and cooked through.

itemListElement.text: When the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill/fry pan onto a plate, loosely cover with foil and set aside for 10 minutes.
itemListElement.name: When the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill/fry pan onto a plate, loosely cover with foil and set aside for 10 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Serve the chicken with the zucchini salad and toasted bread.
itemListElement.name: Serve the chicken with the zucchini salad and toasted bread.

itemListElement.text: Add the 1 tablespoon of olive oil (from the Zucchini Side ingredients) into the jar with the remaining Dressing Marinade and shake well. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: Add the 1 tablespoon of olive oil (from the Zucchini Side ingredients) into the jar with the remaining Dressing Marinade and shake well. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Toss the zucchinis and mint with the Dressing Marinade.
itemListElement.name: Toss the zucchinis and mint with the Dressing Marinade.
